title: Decision of the President and Statement of Reasons
summary: The document is a presidential decision approving the appeal by the Alaska Industrial Development and Export Authority (AIDEA) for the Ambler Road Project, as outlined in their 2016 revised consolidated application. The decision, made under section 1106(a) of the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act (ANILCA), directs relevant federal agencies to issue necessary authorizations for the project's establishment. The decision was made on October 6, 2025, and published in the Federal Register on October 8, 2025.
